directoryOverview: Business layer for evaluation lifecycle, template management, APE annual reporting, and ACGME compliance.
keyWorkflows: APE annual program evaluation and reporting
Milestone competency tracking and ACGME compliance

files.summary: Business logic layer for the Annual Program Evaluation (APE) WebForms UI, binding dropdowns, grids, and page state for APE sections.
files.businessPurpose: Orchestrates the APE UI workflow by populating groups, academic years, sections, and admin assignment controls, and retrieves core personnel counts for program committee review.
keyMethods: OnViewInitializeAPE - initializes all APE dropdown and filter controls on page load
OnViewInitializeNewAPE - lightweight init for new APE creation flow
GetCorePersonnelCount - fetches resident/faculty/fellow counts for a given academic year
BindAPEGroups - populates the APE group dropdown from DB
BindAcademicYear - populates academic year dropdown with current year preselected
BindAPESections - populates APE section dropdown with default value
BindAdminAssignedTo - binds admin assignment filter control
BindTakeActionStatus - binds take-action status dropdown
GetTakeActions - retrieves action plan items for a given APE

files.summary: Serializable composite DTO holding all sections of an Annual Program Evaluation record.
files.businessPurpose: Acts as the top-level data container passed between APE business, manager, and UI layers, grouping sub-objects for Committee, Faculty, Residents, Graduates, Program, Monitoring, Stability, Projects, Tracker, TakeAction, and ACGME Common Program Requirements.

files.summary: Data access layer for all APE CRUD operations, file uploads, and sub-section data retrieval via stored procedures.
files.businessPurpose: Provides static methods for fetching and persisting each APE section (Main, Committee, Faculty, Residents, Graduates, Program, Monitoring, Stability, Projects, TakeAction, Tracker) along with file attachment handling.
keyMethods: GetAllAPEGroups - fetches APE group list for current department
GetAllAPESections - fetches all APE sections
GetAPEMain - retrieves APE main record by group, year, section
GetAPEGroupName - looks up group name by ID
GetAPEMainDetail - fetches full APE detail by APEID
GetDepartmentProgramType - returns program type string for department
GetAdminGMEAUsers - lists GMEA admin users for current department
UpdateAPEMain - persists APE main record and returns APEID
GetAPECorePersonnelUserCount - returns counts of residents/faculty/fellows by academic year

files.summary: Constants, enums, and utility helpers for APE sub-section tab codes and UI control value binding.
files.businessPurpose: Centralizes all APE section/sub-section code constants (e.g. CPECMPP, REMP, FPFD) and provides helper methods for setting selected values on dropdown controls.
keyMethods: SetSelectedTextToControl - sets dropdown selected item by display text
SetSelectedValueToControl - sets dropdown selected item by value

files.summary: Business logic for generating printable Annual Program Report by assembling selected sections and binding data to WebForms page controls.
files.businessPurpose: Orchestrates APE report generation by selecting user-chosen sections (Committee, Residents, Faculty, Graduates, Program, Specific, Stability, Monitoring) and binding grids and panels accordingly.
keyMethods: GenerateAnnualProgramReport - main entry point that routes to per-section bind methods
IncludeSectionStatus - reads section status filter from page form state
IncludeTakeActions - checks whether to include take-action items in report
GetSelectedSubSections - returns list of selected sub-section names from form
GetSelectedSubSectionTabs - returns list of selected sub-section tab names
BuildAnnualProgramReportHeader - populates report header with department and user info

files.summary: Data access manager for retrieving department and user demographic information used in the Annual Program Report header.
files.businessPurpose: Supplies general demographics, department details, and user info to the APE report generator for header construction.
keyMethods: GetDepartmentInfo - fetches department details by ID
GetGeneralDemographicsInfoByUserID - returns multi-table dataset with user demographics
GetUserInfoByDepartmentID - fetches users in a given department
GetFlagArchivedDetailsByUserID - returns archived flag details for a user

files.summary: DTO representing a single answer option within an answer type (scale), including its score, EPA flag, and exclusion status.
files.businessPurpose: Carries individual answer choice data (ID, score, name, EPA indicator, exclude flag) used when building evaluation question scales.

files.summary: Empty stub class with no implemented methods, reserved for future answer-level data access operations.
files.businessPurpose: Placeholder for answer-level DB operations; currently unused.

files.summary: DTO representing an answer scale (e.g. 1-5, Yes/No) with its code, name, sort order, and nested list of answer types.
files.businessPurpose: Models the top-level grouping of scoring scales used across evaluation templates, linking to their constituent AnswerTypeInfo items.

files.summary: DTO for an answer type/set definition including scale, early-warning thresholds, milestone flags, and a list of individual answers.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a fully configured answer scale (e.g. custom Likert set) with all display and scoring properties, used during evaluation template design and score rendering.
keyMethods: Validate - validates answer type name uniqueness and required fields before save
ValidateCopy - validates name uniqueness when copying an answer set

files.summary: Data access manager for answer types (scoring scales), providing fetch, save, update, delete, copy, and uniqueness-check operations.
files.businessPurpose: Manages the full CRUD lifecycle for answer types used in evaluation templates, including fetching answers, checking name/code uniqueness, and supporting bulk operations.
keyMethods: GetAnswerTypesForScale - returns answer types for a given scale and department
FetchAnswerTypeInfo(Int32) - fetches full answer type with answers by ID
FetchAnswersTypeInfo(Int32) - fetches answer type including hidden answers
GetAnswerTypeInfoByEvaluationID - returns all answer types for an evaluation
FetchAnswerTypeInfo(DataSet) - maps DataSet rows to AnswerTypeInfo object
DoesAnswerTypeNameExist - checks for duplicate name
DoesAnswerTypeCodeExist - checks for duplicate code

files.summary: DTO holding burnout category name, average category score, evaluation ID, and department ID for burnout survey results.
files.businessPurpose: Carries aggregated burnout category scoring data linked to a specific evaluation and department.

files.summary: DTO for EBM (Evidence-Based Medicine) clinical summary data captured during Mini-CEX evaluations.
files.businessPurpose: Stores the clinical scenario, PICO elements, evidence, answer, learning outcome, teaching point, and supervisor comments associated with an EBM/Mini-CEX evaluation.

files.summary: Data access manager for clinical summary (EBM) data associated with Mini-CEX evaluations.
files.businessPurpose: Fetches reference lists (clinical tasks, information sources, teaching points) and retrieves or saves EBM clinical summary records for evaluations.
keyMethods: GetClinicalTasks - returns list of clinical task types
GetInformationSource - returns list of information source types
GetMainTeachingPoints - returns teaching point options
GetClinicalSummaryInfo - fetches EBMor clinical summary by evaluation ID
GetClinicalSummaryInfoEBMee - fetches EBMee variant of clinical summary

files.summary: Serializable DTO representing an admin contact user record with change-tracking flags for new, deleted, updated, and DB-persisted states.
files.businessPurpose: Tracks admin user contact records across UI edit operations, supporting incremental save patterns in contact assignment workflows.

files.summary: Serializable DTO for a user contact record with name, role, and deletion tracking.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a user as a contact (evaluator or evaluatee) in evaluation contact search and assignment workflows.

files.summary: Search filter DTO for contact lookup queries, holding user ID, department ID, user type, and scope.
files.businessPurpose: Provides filtering parameters for contact search operations when assigning evaluators or evaluatees.

files.summary: DTO for descriptive criteria (free-text evaluation criteria) with validation logic.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a named descriptive criterion used in evaluations and validates uniqueness before persistence.
keyMethods: Validate - checks name required and uniqueness against existing criteria

files.summary: Data access manager for descriptive criteria CRUD operations with cache invalidation and event raising.
files.businessPurpose: Manages the lifecycle (list, add, update, delete, existence check) of descriptive criteria used in evaluation templates, with cache management and audit event raising.
keyMethods: GetCriteriaList - returns all criteria for current department
GetCriteriaDetailsByCriterionID - fetches a single criterion by ID
Save - adds a new criterion and raises CreateEntity event
Delete - soft-deletes a criterion and raises DeleteEntity event
Update - updates a criterion name and raises UpdateEntity event
DoesCriteriaExists - checks for duplicate criterion name

files.summary: DTO carrying all data for a completed evaluation submission, including scored answers, comments, burnout responses, proxy status, and clinical summary.
files.businessPurpose: Aggregates every data element produced when a user submits an evaluation form: answers, question-level comments, descriptive criteria scores, burnout items, clinical summary, and all role-specific comment fields.

files.summary: DTO for logging evaluation assignment access sessions, capturing access/exit timestamps, browser details, errors, exemptions, and status.
files.businessPurpose: Records user session data for evaluation assignment audit trails, tracking when and how users accessed evaluation forms.

files.summary: DTO for evaluation schedule configuration linking rotations, templates, date ranges, overlap settings, and activity types.
files.businessPurpose: Carries the parameters used to generate or query evaluation assignments from rotation/shift/clinic/call schedules for a given academic year.

files.summary: Data access manager for generating and querying evaluation schedule assignments linked to rotations, shifts, clinics, and calls.
files.businessPurpose: Provides the data layer for auto-generating evaluation assignments from schedule data and for reporting on assignment logs, missing assignments, and overlap notifications.
keyMethods: GenerateAssignment - calls GenerateEvaluationSchedules SP to create assignments from schedule
GetEvaluationSchedules - fetches schedule list for a run mode
GetLogOfEvaluationAssignments - returns assignment log with filtering options
GetLogEvaluationAssignments - paginated assignment log with sort support
SendNoAttendingOverlapNotifications - triggers overlap notification SP
GetRotationNames / GetRotationNamesNew - rotation lookup for schedule linking
GetRotationNamesByAcademicYear - filters rotations by academic year
GetEvaluationsByRotation/Shift/Calls/Clinics - templates linked to activity types
GetAudienceAndSubject - fetches target/subject audience for a template

files.summary: Search filter DTO for evaluation queries with user ID, admin user ID, sort field, and schedule ID.
files.businessPurpose: Provides filter parameters for querying evaluation lists in the management and reporting views.

files.summary: Business logic layer for evaluation template management WebForms pages, orchestrating template listing, deletion, restoration, and multi-step design workflow.
files.businessPurpose: Drives the template lifecycle UI including initialization, delete/restore confirmation, audience selection, question and answer set assignment, publishing, and file attachment handling.
keyMethods: GetEvaluationTemplateDetailsByTemplateID - loads template name and delete/restore state for confirmation page
RestoreEvaluationTemplate - executes delete or restore action and redirects
InitializeEvaluations - sets up management grid with active and deleted templates
OnViewInitialize - initializes template design wizard steps

files.summary: DTO representing a single evaluation assignment record with all scheduling, status, review, and relationship fields.
files.businessPurpose: Carries the full state of an evaluation assignment (template, period, rotation, dates, acknowledgement, review, peer template, shift/clinic/call IDs) between layers.

files.summary: Core data access manager for evaluation submission, retrieval, status transitions, and audience/answer-scale lookups — the largest manager class in the module.
files.businessPurpose: Provides the primary data layer for the evaluation lifecycle: fetching audience lists, submitting evaluation answers and comments, updating status (complete/decline/acknowledge/review), generating assignments, and retrieving scores.
keyMethods: GetListOfAnswerScales - returns available scoring scales
GetAudienceList - returns audience types for template design
GetBaseAudienceDetailsById - fetches audience details
GetTargetSubjectIdByAudienceId - resolves target/subject IDs from audience
FetchListofAnswerScore - generates numeric score list for count-based scales
GetEvaluationsByUserID/ScheduleID - fetches assignments for a user
SaveEvaluationAnswers - persists scored evaluation submission
UpdateEvaluationStatus - changes evaluation status (complete/decline/etc.)

files.summary: Comprehensive report data manager for 72+ evaluation report types, providing fetch methods for summary, individual, trending, competency, and compliance reports.
files.businessPurpose: Serves as the data layer for all evaluation reporting needs including individual evaluations, group summaries, milestone/competency reports, duty hour compliance, APE institutional reports, procedure logs, patient logs, and CME reports.
keyMethods: GetAnswersByAnswerType - fetches answer options for report rendering
GetReportInputInfo - parses report filter parameters from query string/session
DepartmentImagePath - helper for department logo path in reports

files.summary: DTO linking an evaluation template to a rotation/shift/clinic/call with audience, overlap, PGY-specificity, and gap-day settings.
files.businessPurpose: Represents the configuration for attaching an evaluation template to a program rotation or clinical activity, controlling who gets evaluated, when, and with what overlap logic.

files.summary: Data access manager for linking evaluation templates to rotations/clinics/calls/shifts with PGY-specific support and transactional save.
files.businessPurpose: Manages the rotation-template linkage lifecycle, fetching existing links, deleting and re-saving in a transaction, and supporting PGY-specific audience rules for GME programs.
keyMethods: GetRotationPrimaryActivities - returns primary activity type list
GetRotaionGapDays - fetches gap days configured for a rotation
GetFieldsForLinkRotationTemplate - fetches current rotation-template links
LinkEvaluationstoRotation - transactionally replaces rotation-template links
LinkEvaluationstoRotationV1 - extended version with clinic/call/shift/PGY support

files.summary: Serializable composite DTO for an evaluation template definition, including audience, answer scale, questions, options, and milestone/burnout flags.
files.businessPurpose: Carries the full specification of an evaluation template through the multi-step design wizard and persistence layer, from basic settings to question groups, milestone levels, and custom attestation text.

files.summary: Primary data access manager for evaluation template CRUD, publishing, copying, question management, milestone linking, and completion reporting — the largest file in the module.
files.businessPurpose: Provides the full data layer for template management across its lifecycle: creation, editing, publishing, deletion/restoration, copying across departments, question/group assignment, milestone integration, and completion status reporting.
keyMethods: GetEvaluationTemplates - lists active/deleted templates with optional pagination
GetDeletedTemplates - lists soft-deleted templates for restore
GetEvaluationTemplatesDetailsByCriteria - filtered template search
GetCompletionStatusReportData - fetches completion report data
Delete - soft-deletes a template
RestoreEvaluationTemplates - undeletes a template
GetYearList - returns academic year list for dropdown
GetEvaluationTemplateDetailsByTemplateID - fetches single template detail

files.summary: Search filter DTO for evaluation template queries with name, status, target, subject, and delete-flag fields.
files.businessPurpose: Provides filter parameters for template search and list operations in template management views.

files.summary: DTO for evaluation export parameters (template, date range, conference inclusion) with date validation.
files.businessPurpose: Carries the filter criteria and validates inputs for evaluation data export operations.
keyMethods: Validate - checks start/end date are present and start is before end

files.summary: Data access and file-generation manager for exporting evaluation data to Excel, CSV, XML, and MS Access formats.
files.businessPurpose: Fetches evaluation data from the database and writes it to various file formats for download, managing temp file creation, cleanup, and format-specific rendering.
keyMethods: GetDataForEvaluationsExport - fetches evaluation data dataset by template and date range
GetDataForEvaluationsExport1 - extended version with export type parameter
DeleteExistingFiles - cleans up temporary export files
GenerateFileName - creates unique GUID-based file name
ExportEvaluationsToExcel - writes GridView-rendered XLS file
ExportEvaluationsToCSV - writes semicolon-delimited TXT file
ExportEvaluationsToAccess - creates MDB and writes evaluation data
ExportEvaluationsToXML - writes XML document with evaluation records

files.summary: Serializable DTO for a user's favorite report setting, storing report name, ID, redirect URLs, and setting ID.
files.businessPurpose: Persists a user's saved/favorite report configuration for quick re-access from report menus.

files.summary: DTO for Mini-CEX patient encounter data including diagnosis, demographics, exam complexity, feedback time, and satisfaction scores.
files.businessPurpose: Captures the clinical context of a Mini-CEX observation: patient problem, age, gender, type, setting, exam complexity, observation/feedback minutes, evaluator/resident satisfaction, and up to four clinical focus areas.

files.summary: Data access manager for Mini-CEX patient problem/diagnosis data, providing reference list fetches and CRUD for encounter records.
files.businessPurpose: Supports the Mini-CEX form by loading demographic reference lists and saving or retrieving patient encounter context linked to an evaluation.
keyMethods: GetPatientAgeList - returns patient age category options
GetPatientDemographicTypeList - returns patient type options
GetPatientDemographicSettingList - returns clinical setting options
GetExamComplexityList - returns exam complexity level options
GetMinutesList - returns time-in-minutes options
GetPatientProblemFocusList - returns clinical focus area options
GetGenderList - returns gender options
GetPatientProblemDiagnosisInfo - fetches Mini-CEX patient context by evaluation ID
AddPatientProblemDiagnosisInfo - saves Mini-CEX patient encounter record

files.summary: Serializable DTO mirroring EvaluationsTemplateInfo for primary (non-peer) evaluation templates, with identical structure.
files.businessPurpose: Serves as a strongly-typed container for primary template data in contexts where peer and primary template info must be kept separate, sharing the same schema as EvaluationsTemplateInfo.

files.summary: DTO for a question group with name, department, target audience, and validation, including a nested GroupQuestions inner class.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a named grouping of questions associated with a target audience, used to organize questions in the evaluation template designer.
keyMethods: Validate - validates audience and name required, checks name uniqueness

files.summary: Data access manager for question group CRUD and question-to-group assignment operations with caching and event raising.
files.businessPurpose: Manages question groups used in template design: creating groups, listing groups, adding/removing questions from groups, and checking name uniqueness with cache invalidation.
keyMethods: GetListOfQuestionGroups - returns groups for a department (cached)
Delete - deletes a group and raises DeleteEntity event
DoesQuestionGroupNameExists - checks for duplicate group name
Save - creates a new question group
GetListOfQuestionByGroupId - returns questions in a group
DeleteQuestionFromGroup - removes a question from a group
GetListOfQuestionsByAudienceId - returns questions available for an audience
AddQuestionToGroup - adds a question to a group

files.summary: DTO for an evaluation question with category, code, description, sliding scale, confidentiality, and role-based edit permission flags.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a question in the question library with all metadata needed for template design, including which admin roles can edit it and whether it is confidential to the evaluatee.
keyMethods: Validate - validates category and description required before save

files.summary: Data access manager for question library CRUD, category management, code validation, milestone questions, and search operations.
files.businessPurpose: Manages the question bank used across evaluation templates, supporting paginated listing, add, edit, delete, restore, code uniqueness checks, category fetching, and milestone-specific question retrieval.
keyMethods: GetQuestionsByCategoryID - fetches questions for a category with optional pagination
GetDeletedQuestionsByCategoryID - fetches soft-deleted questions
GetListOfQuestionsForMilestone - fetches milestone-specific questions
GetQuestionCategories - returns competency/question categories by audience
GetQuestionCode - generates next question code for a category
CheckQuestionCodeExists - validates uniqueness of a question code
Delete - soft-deletes a question

files.summary: Serializable DTO for quick evaluation configuration, linking audience, subject, template, display message, and menu name.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a pre-configured quick-launch evaluation entry that allows users to start evaluations directly from a named menu item.

files.summary: Data access manager for quick evaluation configuration CRUD and user-type/rotation lookup operations.
files.businessPurpose: Manages the quick evaluation feature allowing departments to configure shortcut evaluation launches, fetching available options by user type and saving or updating configurations.
keyMethods: GetUserTypesForEvaluations - returns user types that can initiate evaluations
GetQuickEvaluationsByDepartment - returns all quick eval configs for current department
GetQuickEvaluationByUserType - returns quick eval options visible to current user
GetUsersScheduledRotations - fetches rotations scheduled for a user within date range
SaveQuickEvaluations - inserts a new quick evaluation configuration
UpdateQuickEvaluations - updates an existing quick evaluation configuration

files.summary: DTO representing a scheduled evaluation assignment job record with user, department, date range, status, and admin name.
files.businessPurpose: Carries configuration and status data for scheduled evaluation assignment generation jobs tracked in the system.

files.summary: Minimal DTO holding user ID, full name, and role ID for evaluation assignment user references.
files.businessPurpose: Provides lightweight user identity data used in evaluation assignment and scheduler contexts.
